Description: Ostracon, fragment of the rim and body of a red pottery dish with flaring sides and rounded rim, the fabric is partially grey in section, the outer surface is covered with a burnished buff-coloured slip and faint traces of black-painted cursive texts.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394404) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394404)
